titles.title: To provide for the use of private delivery services in filing documents with Federal agencies.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Government Management, Information and Technology.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

bill.summary: 2/13/1997--Introduced. Requires any Federal law which provides that an item is deemed to be received by a Federal agency as of the date of the postmark on the item by the United States Postal Service to further provide that such an item is deemed to be received by the Federal agency as of the date marked on the item by a designated private delivery service.
